casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Elgin Orlandas HART. No. 446A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2006. Barbara Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hart. Lisa Y. Harper, Lisa Graham, Assistant Attorney Generals, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of December 2006 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 10th day of January 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of December 2006."
